summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List , and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency outlines 2 open recommendations to prioritize. For example, OCC should work with other federal banking regulators to communicate appropriate uses of alternative data sources—such as rent...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
